items.label: Recital (54) — biometric high-risk rationale
items.text: Certain biometric systems (e.g., remote biometric identification, biometric categorisation for sensitive attributes, some emotion recognition) are high-risk due to inaccuracy risks and potential discriminatory effects; biometric verification solely for authentication/access may be excluded.

items.label: Recital (63) — classification ≠ lawfulness
items.text: Classification as high-risk under this Regulation does not, by itself, make a system’s use lawful under other Union or national law (e.g., data protection regimes).
